# James H. Ward House

| locmapin     = USA Indiana Tippecanoe County#Indiana#USA
| built        = c.
| architecture = Second Empire, Italianate
| added        = April 7, 1988
| area         =
| refnum       = 88000385
}}
James H. Ward House is a historic home located at Lafayette, Indiana, United States.  It was built about 1875, and is a two-story Italianate / Second Empire style brick dwelling, with a -story mansard roofed tower. It features deep overhanging eaves with corner brackets, asymmetrical massing, and an ornate semi-hexagonal, two-story projecting bay.  Also on the property is a contributing carriage house.
It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1988.
